fields.name: Organisation
fields.title: Organisation
fields.description: Full name of the organisation responsible for the publication of this dataset

fields.name: Dataset_Title
fields.title: Dataset_Title
fields.description: Publishing Organisation’s official title for the dataset

fields.name: Abstract
fields.title: Abstract
fields.description: Publishing Organisation’s description of the dataset

fields.name: INSPIRE_Theme
fields.title: INSPIRE_Theme
fields.description: Semi-colon separated list of INSPIRE Theme(s) best describing the dataset. See http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/theme

fields.name: INSPIRE_Feature_Type
fields.title: INSPIRE_Feature_Type
fields.description: Semi-colon separated list of the INSPIRE Feature Type(s) best describing the dataset. http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/featureconcept

fields.name: Other_Related_Themes
fields.title: Other_Related_Themes
fields.description: Semi-colon separated list of keyword values drawn from other vocabularies, e.g. GEMET or industry terms in common usage, where no INSPIRE definition is applicable.

fields.name: Constraints
fields.title: Constraints
fields.description: This field outlines any licencing constraints (where known) e.g. if dataset is published as part of a product

fields.name: Metadata_published_on_dguk
fields.title: Metadata_published_on_dguk
fields.description: A metadata record for this dataset exists on DGUK

fields.name: Data_published
fields.title: Data_published
fields.description: Indicates whether data is publicly available under licence* or statute as part of a product or service. *Non-OGL (Open Government License) terms may apply.

fields.name: Where_To_Find_More_Information
fields.title: Data_published
fields.description: URLs and direct links to datasets or products.
